CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(DTE_Axiom__c,"Own it"), ISPICKVAL(DTE_Axiom_Mobile__c,"Own it"), ISPICKVAL(DTE_Legacy__c,"Own it"), ISPICKVAL(DTE_Legacy_Mobile__c,"Own it") ), "Own it", IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(DTE_Axiom__c,"Own it")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(DTE_Axiom_Mobile__c,"Own it")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(DTE_Legacy__c,"Own it")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(DTE_Legacy_Mobile__c,"Own it")), ISPICKVAL(RollCall__c,"Own it") ), "RollCall Only", "" ) )
CustomField.label: DTE Ownership - Simple
